meanings.definition: A type of tree or shrub belonging to the genus Acacia.
meanings.sent1: The acacias in the park provide shade on sunny days.
meanings.sent2: I planted some acacias in my garden to attract butterflies.
meanings.sent3: The acacias in the forest whispered secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a garden of acacias, each thought a delicate bloom.
meanings.sent5: The scent of acacias in bloom filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.sent1: The landscape was dotted with acacias, their branches swaying in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: We collected seeds from the acacias to plant in our backyard.
meanings.sent3: The acacias at the party were the life of the celebration.
meanings.sent4: His words fell like acacias, casting a comforting shadow over her worries.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured the essence of the acacias in vibrant colors.
